bug.author: ChaiBapchya
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h2>Description</denchmark-h>
<denchmark-h:h4>Search</denchmark-h>
Searching mxnet grid generator, mxnet grid sampler, mxnet bilinear sampler, mxnet batchnorm on google all 3 searches give beta.mxnet.io links in first 2 results Clicking on all of them routes to mxnet.apche.org landing page and not the actual page of the API.
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10992635/87595004-b7ddf600-c6a2-11ea-932e-ce6c31a31519.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10992635/87595012-b9a7b980-c6a2-11ea-86fe-8d5a7dea6ece.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10992635/87595015-bad8e680-c6a2-11ea-9581-8221f299ba86.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/10992635/87595016-bb717d00-c6a2-11ea-9d18-e20ac50295a6.png></denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h2>Suggestions</denchmark-h>
Prevent indexing of beta.mxnet.io & instead have official website APIs getting indexed Redirect beta.mxnet.io links to actual working links [instead of landing page]

comments.comment: We should add a robots.txt to beta.mxnet.io to avoid crawling <denchmark-link:https://github.com/szha>@szha</denchmark-link>
